long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension scrapes the current web page and lists all images found, on tags or even elements with background-image. - references: https://github.com/GoogleChrome/chrome-extensions-samples/tree/main/examples/page-redder https://blog.crimx.com/2017/03/09/get-all-images-in-dom-including-background-en/ - extension icon: made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
